message.entry: List of preprocessing actions applied to signal
Edit functions in MATLAB Editor, edit description, or remove from the preprocess gallery.

Add a function with the following syntax to the Signal Analyzer preprocessing gallery.
 
[y,tOut] = Name(x,tIn,varargin)

 x, the selected signal, and tIn, its time vector, are automatically passed into the function.
 An optional input argument list can also be specified.
My custom function with optional input arguments 'arg1,arg2...'
Specify a valid MATLAB function name

does not exist.
 Do you want to create it?
Edit description of custom function in the Signal Analyzer preprocessing gallery.

Are you sure you want to overwrite the following signals?

{0}
Do not ask again. Signals will be overwritten.
Unable to plot the spectrum or spectrogram of a complex-valued signal using log scale. Turn off the spectrum and spectrogram views or change the frequency scale.
Scalogram plot does not support non-uniformly sampled signals. Resample the signal or change the signal table selection.
Scalogram in Signal Analyzer does not support complex signals. Plot a different signal or turn off the scalogram view.
Unable to plot the spectrogram, scalogram or persistence spectrum of more than one signal. Use a separate display or turn off the spectrogram view and persistence view.
Unable to plot the spectrum, spectrogram or persistence spectrum of signals with non-finite values. Turn off the spectrum, spectrogram and persistence spectrum view.
Unable to plot the spectrum, spectrogram, scalogram or persistence spectrum of signals with non-finite values. Turn off the spectrum, spectrogram, scalogram and persistence spectrum view.
Some signals were unplotted because the spectrum, spectrogram or persistence spectrum cannot be plotted for signals with non-finite values.
Some signals were unplotted because the spectrum, spectrogram, scalogram or persistence spectrum cannot be plotted for signals with non-finite values.
Change current folder in MATLAB and try again. You do not have write permission to following folder:
Unable to edit signals in a labeledSignalSet. Change signal table selection.
Power levels are smaller than expected for some signals because their spectra were computed using a window length greater than 2^(floor(log2(L)) + 3), where L is the signal length.
